questions: How much have your sleeping habits changed since you started work here? (1: didn't change at all; 10: changed a lot)
How much has your appetite changed since you started working here? (1: didn't change at all; 10: changed a lot)
How moody are you at work? (1: not at all; 10: very moody)
How much have your relationships suffered as a result of work? (1: not at all; 10: suffered a lot)
How much of your outside commitments (anything you do other than work, e.g. basketball) suffered because of work? (1: not at all; 10: suffered a lot)
How much are you not satisfied with your salary? (1: feeling good about your salary; 10: very upset about your salary)
How much do you worry about losing your job? (1: not at all; 10: worry about it all the time)
How upset are you during your payday? (1: not at all; 10: very upset)
Assuming no privacy issues, how much are you feeling uncomfortable letting other people know your salary? (1: very comfortable; 10: not at all)
How much do you worry about meeting your expenses with your income? (1: not at all; 10: worry about it a lot)
How much do you feel uncomfortable with your bosses and colleagues? (1: not at all; 10: very uncomfotable)
How much do you see yourself as an incapable person? (1: you are confident about yourself; 10: you feel like you can't do anything)
How much do you struggle on completing tasks of your work? (1: not at all; 10: struggle a lot)
How often do you work under pressure? (1: not at all; 10: you work under pressure all the time)
How will you rate your mental state at work? (1: really good; 10: really bad)
How much do you feel uncomfortable in class? (1: not at all; 10: very uncomfortable)
How much do you feel unable to cope up with the subjects? (1: not at all; 10: can't follow at all)
How difficult are you when you are facing the faculty? (1: pretty easy; 10: very difficult)
How often do you feel frustrated after receiving your grades? (1: not at all; 10: always frustrated)
How much are the external factors affecting your grades? (1: not at all; 10: your grades are hugely affected)
How much do you feel your grade does not reflect the effort you put in studying? (1: your grades are cosistent with your effort; 10: your grades don't reflect your effort at all)
How much scared are you for exams overnight? (1: you are relaxed; 10: you are very scared)
Rate the severity of bullying you are facing (1: not at all; 10: very severe)
How much traumatized are you after bullying (1: you are ok; 10: you feel really bad)?
How much is your family issue affecting your mental health? (1: not at all; 10: it affects a lot)
How much do you feel disconnected with your family? (1: not at all; 10: you are totally disconnected)
How much do you think your family is not supporting your career/hobbies? (1:your family is quite nice; 10: your family don't support you at all)
How much pressure are you facing from your family? (1: not at all; 10: a lot of pressure)
How much do you feel disconnected between you and your partner? (1: not at all; 10: you are totally disconnected)
How much do you feel your partner doesn't understand you? (1: he/she understands you pretty well; 10: he/she doesn't understand you at all)
How often do you feel like you are accepting something you disagree? (1: not at all; 10: all the time)
How much do you feel having trouble talking to people? (1: not at all; 10: you can't talk with people at all)
How much are you scared of being hated by others? (1: not at all; 10: you are very scared about it)
Rate the degree of trouble you have maintaining a good relationship with others. (1: no trouble at all; 10: lots of trouble)
